thread.title: Singer CeeLo Green reveals he's been engaged for 1 year
thread.title_full: Singer CeeLo Green reveals he's been engaged for 1 year

title: Singer CeeLo Green reveals he's been engaged for 1 year
text:
Updated: 11:59 a.m. Friday, Oct. 23, 2015 | Posted: 11:59 a.m. Friday, Oct. 23, 2015 Singer CeeLo Green reveals he's been engaged for 1 year Related CeeLo Green poses for a portrait on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Sponsored Links The Associated Press NEW YORK â€” 
Recording a new album isn't the only thing CeeLo Green has done in the last year: The singer revealed that he also proposed to his longtime girlfriend. 
Green, 41, told People magazine that he's been engaged to Shani James, 38, for about a year. A representative for the Grammy winner confirmed the engagement on Friday. 
Green will release a new album, "Heart Blanche," on Nov. 6. 
The former "Voice" coach said he and James didn't want to promote their engagement. 
"We're a collective power together because our private life is sacred. But you know ... maybe it is time for the world to know that I have a very secure situation and a loving woman supporting me the entire way," he said. 
Green was previously married to Christina Johnson. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our WPXI-TV Daily Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
